column5: Great report Rich, love that pike!!   Thanks for taking the time.
Very nice!Its good to hear your still fishing. SOme quality fish too! I was wondering what happened to you! I sent you a few PMs.
By far the report of the year , right here , right now.......
Been wondering where you've been rich ... we sure missed ya.  still have yet to venture out your way for some carp yet ... one day!
Good to see pics of you and your fish Rich. Have a cheeeseburger or something dude, you're wasting away  .

Thanks for the kind words everyone, good to be back. Coming soon: A 3 hour hike/camping/fishing trip photo diary. lol  And Jedi, I eat more now than I did at 300lbs, however I keep physically active more than ever. The weight stays off, I remain energetic almost all the time and generally stay happier. Anyone who is overweight, walk walk walk! I walked off 130lbs before I started any real workout regimen.
Rich who???  j/k  Yer slimmin' down Simswichmuncher!!!  Good pike dood but where are your rockies?
why to to go rich great year so far
Hey, nice to see you!  I have missed your reports and sense of humour! Great shots and I agree....walk walk walk!
Great fishing BBR   how's the family???
OOPs double post.

Been a while since I've stopped in. I've been without the internet for a little over a year now.. even now I'm just on because there's a decent wireless signal. Time has been spent outdoors, learning about everything to do with the outdoors.. still fishin though.  PICS:  Ice Pike        One Random Bow   Channel Cats       Carp       A Day in Dunnville     Bass Opener  My boss with the biggest of the day  Scum frog bass   It's been a pretty decent year, summer has blown for me but I always have high hopes. Now it's almost fall, can't wait for big bass, pike & muskies!

Nice fish brother! Nice to see you dropping in on here also! Averie and I didn't make it out this morning, so your bot missing out on anything.  Keep me posted about your plans for Friday.  Cheers, Ryan
YEAHHHHHHH!   Rich is BACK..... Dude.... i miss your reports.... hope to see you at this years Fish a thon
Good to have you back Rich, it's been a long time.
Glad to see ya back on here. See ya next weekend
Good 2 have you back Rich.
Great report. It's like fishing porn, lots of pics and only a few words!!!
Thanks. I always wondered what the term " fish porn " meant on this board.
Looks like you've had some success.. Beauty pike man!!
really nice.
No WGSF???
Good to see yah back BBR! Nice pics! HH
Seen your post on the fresh/salt water.I said Rich is back????????  Good to hear from you Rich.Nice pics.Hope alls going well for ya.
love the pike ! looks like a great season so far
Nicely done!
Looks like it has been a good season so far brother
Welcome back dude     Looks like you had an awesome year    so far     Looking forward to your future reports!!! Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice to see you back Rich, great report and some darn nice fish there  Lookin good too bud, you lost weight?  Joey
Great Report Man . . . nice to see how you mix up the species you fish for, and an amazing report.  Thanks for sharing.  Cheers Ryan
Good bunch of fish!
The mark of a good fisherman is becoming good at multispecies. You my friend are a good fisherman.
Welcome back Rich.  Great line-up of fish.  Some spectacular specimens for sure
Wonderful mix bag!! miss your reports.
awesome pike  go ti cats! haha
